official_title: To amend the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to ensure State control over academic standards, and for other purposes.

summary.text: This bill amends the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to allow a state to withdraw from the Common Core State Standards developed under the Common Core State Standards Initiative, any other academic standards common to a significant number of states, or assessments tied to such standards.
